name: Piano Roles
description: A survey of the 300-year history of the piano. An historic overview of instruments, makers and designers, composers and performers, changing repertories, representations of the piano in the visual arts and film, the acculturating force of the piano in various cultures, and contemporary contexts of piano performance. Who gets to play the piano, and when, where, how, and under what circumstances? What contributes to the piano’s popularity through the ages, and why does it hold such an iconic status in so many different cultures?
